channel.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
channel.description: Hey guys, i'm currently making an Mage Range tank and i don't know what chaotic i should get, The Chaotic Crossbow (The Chaotic crossbow simply has about 33% more ranged attack than the rune crossbow) the Chaotic Staff The Farseer kiteshield(The farseer kiteshield soaks up 7% of all received Magic damage and 14% of all received melee damage that would have hit for 200 life points or more. ) the Eagle eye kiteshield (The Eagle-eye kiteshield soaks up 7% of all received ranged damage and 14% of all received magic damage that would have hit for 200 life points or more.) or the chaotic kiteshield. (It provides 7% melee and 14% ranged damage absorption for damage of over 200 life points) i really don't know what i should get, ur opinion?

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

[quote=“SacredHeart, post:21, topic:405926”][quote author=lorenso link=topic=502918.msg3680622#msg3680622 date=1311505040]

Use chaotic Raiper, look at the name. It rapes!

I can’t, because i am an Range Mage tank.
[/quote]
What is your attack level, but trust me get 80 attk.[/quote]
My attack level won’t be near 80, so there will be no point in getting it. And i got an Rapier on another account of mine already.

Read full topic

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I don’t play nowadays but this would be opinion of what you should use…

Main weps - chaotic crossbow + sol
cape - ava acum + sara cape
helm - torag helm
body - d hide + ahrims body
legs - verac skirt + ahrims bottems
gloves - barrows gloves
shield - obby shield + unholy book
boots - snakeskin boots
ring - ring of life/ onyx ring (i)
spec wep - depends on your pk method
Substitute the items for better/worse depending on your pk method.

i used to like to bring a pair of chaps with me if i was going for high dps.
Substitute better/worse items for your budget
Have fun

Read full topic

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:15, topic:405926”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=502918.msg3679665#msg3679665 date=1311450928]Well the kid is choosing one, and its probably better to have a good defensive bonus first. The only good side aside from the accuracy of getting the chaotic crossbow is the fast he can have a dragonfire shield, and thats only if the opponent is using dragonstone bolts, otherwise one of the chaotic shields could be better.
[/quote]

Uhh? Accuracy plays an important role too. If you can sit there taking hits against another tank, but you’re unable to hit too, where do you plan to go in PvP? The DFS is probably better anyway considering how popular dragonstone bolts are.

OP: Get the chaotic shield after your c’bow.[/quote]Meh, i don’t know anymore. I’m too used to PvM and have never really seen a chaotic crossbow used in PvP. I was thinking more of him tanking and using a lot of magic as well (when I think tank, I typically think melee armor promarily) making the chaotic’s accuracy less of a necessity.

Read full topic

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Something to consider: lots of people use void which sacrifices a lot of defence, yet makes their DPS spike.

Read full topic

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

rip4d:

Well the kid is choosing one, and its probably better to have a good defensive bonus first. The only good side aside from the accuracy of getting the chaotic crossbow is the fast he can have a dragonfire shield, and thats only if the opponent is using dragonstone bolts, otherwise one of the chaotic shields could be better.

Uhh? Accuracy plays an important role too. If you can sit there taking hits against another tank, but you’re unable to hit too, where do you plan to go in PvP? The DFS is probably better anyway considering how popular dragonstone bolts are.

OP: Get the chaotic shield after your c’bow.

Read full topic

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Zammy book/rune kite/blessed spirit shield/obby shield - depends what you want to risk.

Read full topic

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

Alright, i’m thinking im gonna get the c’bow and then later get one of the 3 shields, Btw what shield should i get after i got the C’bow?

Read full topic

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:11, topic:405926”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=502918.msg3679647#msg3679647 date=1311450546]
You treat me as if I’m an idiot. Yes, I’m fully aware that the Chaotic crossbow is about 33% more accurate that the rune crossbow, but when you have other range boosting gear such as dragonhide, you really don’t need it as badly. Plus, its better to have a good defence because if the enemy can’t hit you (or at least not as hard), then your chances are much higher of winning. Having both is probably the best option though.
[/quote]

You just proved my point. Mix of attack and defence = tank gear + chaotic c’bow. You get the better attack bonus from the chaotic c’bow rather than rune, and with proper tank gear you’re less likely to get hit. What are you trying to prove?[/quote]Well the kid is choosing one, and its probably better to have a good defensive bonus first. The only good side aside from the accuracy of getting the chaotic crossbow is the fast he can have a dragonfire shield, and thats only if the opponent is using dragonstone bolts, otherwise one of the chaotic shields could be better.

Read full topic

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

rip4d:

You treat me as if I’m an idiot. Yes, I’m fully aware that the Chaotic crossbow is about 33% more accurate that the rune crossbow, but when you have other range boosting gear such as dragonhide, you really don’t need it as badly. Plus, its better to have a good defence because if the enemy can’t hit you (or at least not as hard), then your chances are much higher of winning. Having both is probably the best option though.

You just proved my point. Mix of attack and defence = tank gear + chaotic c’bow. You get the better attack bonus from the chaotic c’bow rather than rune, and with proper tank gear you’re less likely to get hit. What are you trying to prove?

Read full topic

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

range attack bonus

rip4d:

You treat me as if I’m an idiot. Yes, I’m fully aware that the Chaotic crossbow is about 33% more accurate that the rune crossbow, but when you have other range boosting gear such as dragonhide, you really don’t need it as badly. Plus, its better to have a good defence because if the enemy can’t hit you (or at least not as hard), then your chances are much higher of winning. Having both is probably the best option though.

I guess you’ve never seen someone use a chaotic crossbow.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

You treat me as if I’m an idiot. Yes, I’m fully aware that the Chaotic crossbow is about 33% more accurate that the rune crossbow, but when you have other range boosting gear such as dragonhide, you really don’t need it as badly. Plus, its better to have a good defence because if the enemy can’t hit you (or at least not as hard), then your chances are much higher of winning. Having both is probably the best option though.

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

rip4d:

…even though the rune crossbow can use every type of bolt there is aside from bone and kebbit?

You realize that an attack bonus is helpful against other tanks, right? The chaotic c’bow puts you above game against any other tank that’s using a rune c’bow.

Read full topic

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:5, topic:405926”][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=502918.msg3679341#msg3679341 date=1311434651]
The bow doesn’t give more attack bonus, it’s simply a bit more accurate. Not really worth it if you’re going to pk. Get one of the shields.
[/quote]

Someone doesn’t know what an attack bonus is. Go for the crossbow - at higher levels, you can use it in conjunction with higher leveled bolts to hit high frequently. A shield can easily be sufficed with something else.[/quote]…even though the rune crossbow can use every type of bolt there is aside from bone and kebbit?

Read full topic

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Crossbow is much more accurate and is useful for hitting through defence.

Read full topic

item.title: MageRange tank what chaotic?
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

The bow doesn’t give more attack bonus, it’s simply a bit more accurate. Not really worth it if you’re going to pk. Get one of the shields.

Someone doesn’t know what an attack bonus is. Go for the crossbow - at higher levels, you can use it in conjunction with higher leveled bolts to hit high frequently. A shield can easily be sufficed with something else.

Read full topic

@lorenso wrote:

Hey guys, i’m currently making an Mage Range tank and i don’t know what chaotic i should get,
The Chaotic Crossbow (The Chaotic crossbow simply has about 33% more ranged attack than the rune crossbow)
the Chaotic Staff
The Farseer kiteshield(The farseer kiteshield soaks up 7% of all received Magic damage and 14% of all received melee damage that would have hit for 200 life points or more. )
the Eagle eye kiteshield (The Eagle-eye kiteshield soaks up 7% of all received ranged damage and 14% of all received magic damage that would have hit for 200 life points or more.)
or
the chaotic kiteshield. (It provides 7% melee and 14% ranged damage absorption for damage of over 200 life points) i really don’t know what i should get, ur opinion?
